Package com.lonnyjacobson.webapp_minifier

The Webapp Minifier plugin minifies CSS and JavaScript either embedded in or reference by HTML files.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
DefaultTagHandler This class provides the default NodeHandler implementation.
HelpMojo Display help information on webapp-minifier-maven-plugin.
Call mvn webapp-minifier:help -Ddetail=true -Dgoal=<goal-name> to display parameter details.
MinificationContext This class defines the context for a minification session.
MinifiedFileBuilder This class assists in the creation of MinifiedFileInfo instances.
MinifiedFileInfo This class contains details about a minified file.
WebappMinifierMojo Minifies the web application.
WebappMinifierReportMojo Generates a report summarizing the minification performed on the web application.
 

Package com.lonnyjacobson.webapp_minifier Description

The Webapp Minifier plugin minifies CSS and JavaScript either embedded in or reference by HTML files.
